In this experiment, you will watch several videos and imagine yourself as the vehicle's driver. You will be asked to answer questions based on your feelings about the interactions and the distance from the cyclist. All videos feature manually driven cars. Please focus on your perspective as the driver when assessing the proximity and interactions between the vehicle and the cyclist.
